statements: SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_policies;
SELECT policy_name, regulation FROM nuclear_energy_policies WHERE agreement IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name FROM nuclear_energy_policies WHERE regulation = 'Strict';
SELECT policy_id, agreement FROM nuclear_energy_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE 'N%';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, agreement FROM nuclear_energy_policies WHERE regulation = 'Strict';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, agreement FROM nuclear_energy_policies WHERE agreement IS NOT NULL ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_policies ORDER BY policy_id ASC, policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM nuclear_energy_policies WHERE agreement = 'Approved' ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_policies_table;
SELECT policy_name, policy_date FROM nuclear_policies_table;
SELECT * FROM international_agreements_table WHERE agreement_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_name, participating_countries FROM international_agreements_table ORDER BY agreement_end_date DESC;
SELECT id, policy_name, regulation_description FROM nuclear_policies_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_policies_table WHERE policy_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, policy_name FROM nuclear_policies_table WHERE id = 3;
SELECT agreement_name, participating_countries FROM international_agreements_table WHERE agreement_start_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_policies_table ORDER BY policy_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_name, agreement_end_date FROM international_agreements_table WHERE agreement_end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM nuclear_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM nuclear_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_framework ORDER BY regulator_department ASC;
SELECT agreement_details, agreement_name FROM international_agreements WHERE partner_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM nuclear_policies WHERE policy_id = 2 ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT agreement_name, partner_country FROM international_agreements WHERE agreement_id > 5 ORDER BY partner_country DESC;

SELECT regulatory_framework.regulation_name, regulatory_framework.regulator_department, international_agreements.agreement_name FROM regulatory_framework INNER JOIN international_agreements ON regulatory_framework.regulation_id = international_agreements.agreement_id;

SELECT policy_name, policy_description, regulation_name FROM nuclear_policies INNER JOIN regulatory_framework ON nuclear_policies.policy_id = regulatory_framework.regulation_id WHERE regulatory_framework.regulation_name LIKE '%nuclear%';
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_details FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id = 3;
SELECT agency_name, agency_head, agency_location FROM agencies WHERE agency_head LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT agreement_name, agreement_details FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulation_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT agency_name, agency_head, agency_location FROM agencies WHERE agency_location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM nuclear_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_date FROM nuclear_policies WHERE policy_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM nuclear_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE agreement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_date FROM nuclear_policies WHERE policy_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, agency_name FROM nuclear_policies JOIN agency ON nuclear_policies.policy_id = agency.agency_id;
SELECT country_name, agreement_name FROM countries JOIN agreements ON countries.country_id = agreements.agreement_id WHERE country_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, regulation_name FROM nuclear_policies JOIN regulations ON nuclear_policies.policy_id = regulations.regulation_id;
